title: Metallica - Death Magnetic(The Moderus Remaster II)
description:
This is my second attempt at making Death Magnetic better. It will be followed by a bonus disc that will contain four other versions of "Suicide & Redemption".

Tracklist:

1. 	That Was Just Your Life   	
2. 	The End of the Line   	
3. 	Broken, Beat & Scarred   	
4. 	The Day That Never Comes   	
5. 	All Nightmare Long   	
6. 	Cyanide   	
7. 	The Unforgiven III   	
8. 	The Judas Kiss   	
9. 	Suicide & Redemption   	
10. 	My Apocalypse 	

More info as requested:

What I did differently this time was to mix it properly instead of using the retail as a guideline. The drums sit nicely with the guitars, and the bass sits evenly with the drums. The vocals were the hard part, and I got them to mix with the rest of the music as well as I could. Since some of the guitars were mixed with the drum stem, I leveled the guitar stem exactly to what was on the drum stem. After getting all the levels proper, I mastered it clearer than the retail disc because it just sounds better not all compressed. There is maybe a 2% loss of dynamics in this mix, instead of being brickwalled like my last one, which is what the retail was. This mix may not be as loud, but it packs way more punch in my opinion.
